Template Function rain_evaporation_sb¶

  • Defined in File user_functions.h

Function Documentation¶

template<class float_t>
void rain_evaporation_sb(float_t &qr_prime, float_t &Nr, float_t &qv_prime, float_t &qc_prime, float_t &T_prime, float_t &p_prime, float_t &s_sw, float_t &p_sat, std::vector<float_t> &res, model_constants_t &cc)¶

Rain evaporation after Seifert (2008)

qr_prime Rain mixing ratio Nr Number of rain droplets qv_prime Water vapor mixing ratio qc_prime Cloud water mixing ratio T_prime Temperature [K] p_prime Pressure [Pa] s_sw Over saturation of water p_sat Saturation pressure of water [Pa] res Vector to store the changes cc Model constants
